channel.title: Gabe Amaya's Journal
channel.description: Recent content on Gabe Amaya's Journal

item.title: Cards
item.description: #success-box { background: linear-gradient( 135deg, #81FBB8 10%, #28C76F 100%); } #error-box { background-image: linear-gradient( 135deg, #FF9D6C 10%, #BB4E75 100%); } #cat-box { background-image: linear-gradient( 135deg, #EE9AE5 10%, #5961F9 100%); } .cat-text { color: #5961F9; } .card-box { border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 20px #cbcdd3; perspective: 40px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-content: center; align-items: center; text-align: center; padding: 40px 20px; } #card-container { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr)); grid-gap: 40px; width: 800px; margin: 60px auto; } .

item.title: Console Wars 2018
item.description: We are at the peak of the ‘Console Wars’. I know that term died awhile back but in my opinion it is still very much alive today as the fanboy-ism is very active in the respected communities. I, for one, have been super loyal to Microsoft and the Xbox since the original launched in 2001. My pops had a PS2 so I would often go over and play those exclusives. At that time it was Metal Gear, Tekken and my one of my all time favorites, Kingdom Hearts.

item.title: First
item.description: I am back on my GitHub swag. Stepping up everyday. I work from my work comp because it is a little more powerful. I just cloned my repo back to my home comp and going to make some changes from here. Holla at me one time real quick.
